channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15883] Adding WAL files and tracking offsets in HBase.
item.description: Implemented simple offset tracking for WAL files inside of an HBase table along with Unit Testing. Have not implemented queue claiming yet
item.summary: Adding WAL files and tracking offsets in HBase.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: can you post the patch on reviews.apache.org? it's easier to review and make comments
Oh ok. I posted a version of the patch on https://reviews.apache.org/r/47861/

Sorry had to make a last minute change since last commit. It was a bug I discovered during claimQueues().

@Joseph:
In the future, can you add 'hbase' to review groups ?

Please also fill out description of the JIRA.
@Ted the description is filled out in the parent. And several people have commented on the diff on review board. Everything is just fine here. Thanks anyway.
Oh ok, my bad. I'll fill that out right now.
